ViewObject.Name: StatusView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT 'Pending' STATUS_CODE, 'Pending' STATUS_DESC FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Active' STATUS_CODE, 'Active' STATUS_DESC FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Canceled' STATUS_CODE, 'Canceled' STATUS_DESC FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Expired' STATUS_CODE, 'Expired' STATUS_DESC FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Hold' STATUS_CODE, 'Hold' STATUS_DESC FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Rejected' STATUS_CODE, 'Rejected' STATUS_DESC FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Renewed' STATUS_CODE, 'Renewed' STATUS_DESC FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Replaced' STATUS_CODE, 'Replaced' STATUS_DESC FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Revoked' STATUS_CODE, 'Revoked' STATUS_DESC FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Suspended' STATUS_CODE, 'Suspended' STATUS_DESC FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Void' STATUS_CODE, 'Void' STATUS_DESC FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Warning' STATUS_CODE, 'Warning' STATUS_DESC FROM DUAL
